channel.title: briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Witkoff in Moscow for peace talks. And, the Voting Rights Act faces new threats
item.description: U.S. special envoy Steve Witkoff is in Russia to discuss the war in Ukraine ahead of a deadline for peace. And, today marks the 60th anniversary of th...

item.title: Hiroshima survivors fear rising nuclear threat on the 80th anniversary of atomic bombing
item.description: With the number of survivors rapidly declining and their average age now exceeding 86, this year's anniversary is considered the last milestone event ...

item.title: Stanford Newspaper Challenges Legal Basis for Student Deportations

item.title: 60 years later, Voting Rights Act protections for minority voters face new threats

item.title: With $1K in cash aid, he built a life-changing barbershop. Now cash aid is under fire
item.description: This man in Mozambique is one of many who've received a cash sum with no strings attached. The Trump administration has criticized and curtailed the p...

item.title: Trump to Announce Additional $100 Billion Apple Investment in U.S.
item.description: The pledge was a “significant acceleration” of the company’s plan for more production in the United States, according to a White House statement.

item.title: Voice of America director says Trump officials are illegally ousting him
item.description: A judge is demanding answers about the international broadcaster's future from Trump official Kari Lake.

item.title: Wildfire In Wet Washington State Is Changing Under Climate Change
item.description: The famously rainy state is facing longer, hotter and drier fire seasons, raising the risk of a mammoth fire that will be nearly impossible to fight. ...

item.title: Donald Trump and John Roberts Have a Lot in Common
item.description: The Supreme Court may extinguish a law that more than any other made the promise of American democracy a reality.
